document_data.caption: A brachiosaurus.
document_data.name: Brachiosaurus
document_data.mainbody: '''Brachiosauruses''' ({{Pronounce|bratch|ee|o|SAR|us|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|25}}}}) were a type of large and incredibly heavy dinosaur, similar to a [[brontosaurus]].
document_data.Description: Brachiosaurs were considered to be among some of the heaviest dinosaurs to ever live, weighing around {{SIrange|85|90|tons|k|long=yes}}. Their bodies were around {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} in length.
document_data.Reputation: Though peaceful, due to their immense size brachiosaurs had a tendency to accidentally step on smaller creatures and thus could pose a threat to [[adventurer]]s.

Ecology.Diet: Brachiosaurs were a herbivorous species of dinosaur.
Ecology.Habitats:
These creatures were known to inhabit lakes and swamps in regions with a warm climate.

{{-}}
